data: Dans une grande maison bourgeoise, deux femmes, une veuve et une étudiante, se disputent l’amour d’un homme disparu jusqu’à sombrer dans la folie. (Julie just strated university in Bordeaux. She moves into the house of Elizabeth, an old widow who lends her a room in exchange for her help with daily chores. There’s one condition : acting as if Victor, Elizabeth’s dead husband, was still alive. But soon, Julie starts feeling his presence…and an inescapable and dangerous love triangle begins.)
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)
Dans une grande maison bourgeoise, deux femmes, une veuve et une étudiante, se disputent l’amour d’un homme disparu jusqu’à sombrer dans la folie.

Julie just strated university in Bordeaux. She moves into the house of Elizabeth, an old widow who lends her a room in exchange for her help with daily chores. There’s one condition : acting as if Victor, Elizabeth’s dead husband, was still alive. But soon, Julie starts feeling his presence…and an inescapable and dangerous love triangle begins.
